page.title: Endpoint Management
page.noEndpointsDesc: Click 'Add Endpoint' button to add an endpoint

actions.addDesc: Click to add new endpoint configuration

addModal.title: Add API Endpoint
addModal.importDesc: Click to import existing endpoint configuration
addModal.helpText: You can manually fill in the configuration information, or click the icon above to quickly import an existing endpoint configuration.
addModal.name: Endpoint Name
addModal.importPlaceholder:
API URL: http(s)://xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:10101/api/v1
API KEY: xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

editApiKeyModal.title: Edit API Key
editApiKeyModal.warning: ⚠️ The endpoint will automatically disconnect and reconnect after modifying the key

deleteModal.title: Confirm Delete Endpoint
deleteModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete endpoint
deleteModal.warning: ⚠️ This action cannot be undone. All configurations for this endpoint will be permanently deleted.

importModal.title: Import Data
importModal.helpText1: • Please select a previously exported JSON data file
importModal.helpText2: • Do not close the window during import
importModal.helpText3: • Duplicate data will be automatically skipped
importModal.validateDesc: Found {count} endpoints, please review validation results (drag to reorder):
importModal.validateNote: Note: Only endpoints with version ≥ 1.10.0 will be imported. Lower versions or failed connections will be automatically skipped. Drag rows to adjust import order.

toast.incompleteParamsDesc: Please fill in complete URL and API Key
toast.testSuccessDesc: Endpoint connection is normal, can receive SSE events
toast.testFailedDesc: Connection failed, please check if configuration is correct
toast.addSuccessDesc: {name} has been successfully added to endpoint list
toast.addFailedDesc: Please check input information and try again
toast.importSuccessDesc: Configuration has been successfully imported to the form
toast.importFailedDesc: Unable to recognize configuration format, please check content
toast.reconnectSuccessDesc: Endpoint reconnect request sent, attempting to establish connection...
toast.reconnectFailedDesc: Reconnect request failed, please try again later
toast.connectSuccessDesc: Endpoint connection request sent, attempting to establish connection...
toast.connectFailedDesc: Connection request failed, please try again later
toast.disconnectFailedDesc: Disconnect failed, please try again later
toast.exportSuccessDesc: Data has been successfully exported to file
toast.exportFailedDesc: An error occurred while exporting data
toast.fileFormatErrorDesc: Please select a JSON format file
toast.selectFileDesc: Please select an endpoint configuration file to import first
toast.validateFailedDesc: An error occurred while validating import data
toast.noImportableDesc: All endpoints do not meet import conditions
toast.importDataFailedDesc: An error occurred while importing data
toast.renameSuccessDesc: Endpoint name has been updated to "{name}"
toast.editApiKeySuccessDesc: API Key has been updated, reconnecting...
